section_title: Assessment of the Special Climate Change Fund (SCCF)
sentences: Parties met in informal consultations throughout the day to consider the assessment of the SCCF, with discussions focusing on the scope of the assessment.
The SBI closing plenary adopted conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2009/L.14).
The Philippines, for the G-77/CHINA, expressed dismay that the work of the SBI had been subject to delays on issues of particular concern to developing countries.
